original: HENRIKSON, Carl Sigfrid, Grosshandlare, Laholm, f Veinge 86 av lantbr J P Henrikson o h h Johanna, gm Hanna Nyberg. Anst h fma Kull & Hellsten Laholm 00—12. Inneh eg fma i spannmål, fodervaror, gödn.ämn samt speceri- o div.handel. Ordf Laholms sparb o Laholms högerfrn, ordf i lokalstyr f Skand bkn.
translated: HENRIKSON, Carl Sigfrid, Merchant, Laholm, b. Veinge 1886 to farmer J.P. Henrikson and his wife Johanna, married to Hanna Nyberg. Employed at Kull & Hellsten Laholm from 1900 to 1912. Owner of a company dealing with grain, animal feed, fertilizers, as well as a grocery and miscellaneous goods store. Chairman of Laholms Savings Bank and Laholm's Conservative Party. Chairman of the local board of directors of Skandia Bank.

owns.name: Henrikson Company
owns.description: Dealing with grain, animal feed, fertilizers, grocery, and miscellaneous goods

memberOf.name: Skandia Bank
memberOf.jobTitle: Chairman of the local board of directors

career.industry: Grain, animal feed, fertilizers, grocery and miscellaneous goods
